body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------
So strange .

Execute ``` 1 & ```

A background job is created with this expression, I got this accidently while I did
``` ls | select -f 1 | fl & ```


Expected behavior
-----------------

```
♥->1 &
At line:1 char:1
+ &
+ ~
Missing expression after '&' in pipeline element.
+ CategoryInfo          : ParserError: (:) [], ParentContainsErrorRecordException
+ FullyQualifiedErrorId : MissingExpression
```

---------------
